item.title: Contribution guidelines for modules
item.description: Contribution guidelines for modules This document describes general guidelines for contributing to PrestaShop modules hosted on GitHub. How to contribute Contributors wishing to edit a module’s files should follow the following process: Create your GitHub account, if you do not have one already. Fork the project to your GitHub account. Clone your fork to your local machine in the /modules directory of your PrestaShop installation. Create a branch in your local clone of the module for your changes.
